This program shows how to manipulate a simple set 
of data and produce a few descriptive statistics.

```{r version-and-current-date}
R.version.string
Sys.Date()
```

The oyster dataset shows two different computer vision methods that can be used to estimate oyster weight and oyster volume. The [data dictionary](http://jse.amstat.org/datasets/30oysters.txt) and the dataset itself can be found [here](http://jse.amstat.org/datasets/30oysters.dat.txt).
